    • 方法详细资料

      • setSDWritingDisabled

        public boolean setSDWritingDisabled(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                    boolean disable)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable SDCard Writing on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to write SDCard on the device.
        参数:
        who - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disable - Whether or not the SDCard Writing should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SDCARD} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isSDWritingDisabled

        public boolean isSDWritingDisabled(android.content.ComponentName who)
        Determine whether or not the device's SDCard Writing has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the SDCard Writing.
        返回:
        true if SDCard Writing has been disabled, otherwise enabled.
